Case Studies

Real projects. Real results. See how we've helped property owners across the UK overcome spray foam challenges.

Success Stories From Across The UK

Every property is unique, but the problems caused by spray foam are remarkably consistent. Here are some real examples of how we've helped homeowners overcome mortgage rejections, insurance issues, and structural concerns.

Case Study 1: Victorian Terrace House - Manchester

The Challenge

A period Victorian terrace house in Manchester had closed-cell spray foam installed in the roof space in 2018. When the owners tried to sell in 2023, three separate mortgage surveys flagged the foam as a "significant risk," citing:

  • Inability to inspect roof timbers for defects
  • Potential moisture trapping concerns
  • Lack of ventilation in traditional construction
  • Insurance implications

Our Solution

We conducted a comprehensive 5-day removal project:

  • Day 1-2: Full site setup, safety systems, and careful foam removal
  • Day 3: Timber inspection revealed minor issues easily rectified
  • Day 4: Installation of traditional breathable insulation
  • Day 5: Final inspection and certification

The Outcome

£15,000
Value recovered
5 days
Project completion

✅ Property sold within 6 weeks of completion

Before & After
Before: Foam-covered rafters
After: Clean accessible roof

Case Study 2: Modern Detached House - Birmingham

The Challenge

A 2010-built detached house had spray foam applied to the underside of roof tiles. The insurance company discovered this during a routine inspection and:

  • Refused to renew the policy
  • Cited potential condensation risks
  • Required immediate professional assessment

Our Solution

Emergency 3-day intervention:

  • Assessment: Comprehensive foam analysis and risk evaluation
  • Removal: Careful extraction without tile damage
  • Remediation: Installation of proper ventilation system
  • Certification: Full compliance documentation

The Outcome

Restored
Insurance coverage
3 days
Emergency completion

✅ Insurance policy renewed immediately

"Foam Fighters saved our home insurance. Professional, fast, and completely resolved the issue."

Case Study 3: Commercial Conversion - Leeds

The Challenge

A converted warehouse property being sold for commercial development had extensive spray foam application. Multiple issues emerged:

  • Building regulations non-compliance
  • Fire safety concerns in commercial setting
  • Structural inspection impossibility
  • Commercial mortgage rejection

Our Solution

Large-scale 10-day commercial project:

  • Phase 1: Safety systems and controlled access
  • Phase 2: Systematic foam removal using specialist equipment
  • Phase 3: Structural engineer inspection access
  • Phase 4: Commercial-grade insulation installation
  • Phase 5: Building control certification

The Outcome

£45,000
Value preserved
10 days
Large-scale completion

✅ Commercial mortgage approved. Development proceeded.

Project Stats
Area covered: 1,200 m²
Foam volume: 85 m³
Team size: 6 specialists
Equipment: Industrial grade
